item.title: Looking for UGC Creators (Parents with Kids) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for parents with young children (preferably in the US) to create a short, 20-30 second UGC video featuring our bath filter. The video should showcase the product in use and highlight its benefits, such as eliminating chlorine and impurities, and nourishing the skin.

Requirements:
- Capture the product in action with your child.
- Emphasize the benefits
- Experience in creating UGC content.

*No need to return the product, feel free to continue using and reaping the benefits!

Hope to hear from you soon! Thank you.


Budget: $55
Posted On: June 20, 2024 08:15 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:English, Content Writing, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: English, Content Writing, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - UGC - Upwork
item.description:
We are a thriving e-commerce brand making waves in various international markets.

We are looking for an experienced and detail-oriented Video Editor  to collaborate closely with our creative team on UGC projects
Description

- You will create 3 videos using our content library.
- Video must contain voiceovers and subtitles, both in english.
- Also keep in mind the Facebook rules about nuditity / adult content.
- Each video should have minimum 3 versions

Requirements:

- Proven video editing experience, especially with UGC and voiceovers.
- Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.
- Ability to collaborate, take feedback positively, and meet tight deadlines.
- Knowledge of French or German will be a plus

How to Apply
Submit your resume and portfolio trough Upwork.
Looking forward to your application

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 20, 2024 08:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Netherlands

item.title: Proofreading and Transcript Editing of Two Video Lessons - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented freelancer who can provide proofreading and editing services for two video lessons, total duration is 2h 15 min.  The lessons are similar to this one: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=htWh35FURuw&t=164s
The lessons have already been transcribed automatically, (scv and txt files) have but we need someone to review the transcripts and make necessary corrections to ensure they are accurate and fluent in English. The ideal candidate should have excellent command over the English language and be able to spot and correct any grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors.
        Skills required:
        - Excellent command over the English language
        - Strong proofreading and editing skills
        - Attention to detail

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 20, 2024 08:05 UTC
Category: Proofreading
Skills:English, Proofreading, Subtitle Edit
Skills: English, Proofreading, Subtitle Edit
Country: Norway

item.title: YouTube Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Pay is $10 per video. Video length around 5 minutes


We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented YouTube Video Creator to join our Ad Network startup. The ideal candidate will produce engaging 5+ minute videos covering topics such as the history of advertising, billboard advertising, and advertising advice. Utilizing AI tools is permitted, but the final content must be polished, coherent, and free of technical issues. Videos can be made from scratch or based on provided titles. The candidate must ensure all scripts and visuals are seamlessly integrated to maintain high-quality production standards.


Pay is $10 per video. Video length around 5 minutes

Budget: $10

item.title: Create fun highlight video for Japan family vacation - Upwork
item.description:
Our family of 4 (mom, dad, brother and I) took a 7 day trip to Japan for family vacation. We'd love to create a fun highlight video with goal to capture fun memories and experiences we had so we can rewatch to remember trip and most importantly appreciate our bonding as a family.

You'll have full creative freedom for how you want to design video including length, transitions, style, photo/video selection, etc. Feel free to be creative and do as much as possible to highlight strong bonding memories together and generate strong excitement/energy when watching video

Searching for a video editor to help create this video highlight. You should be able to work independently and looking for someone who's excited to put in extra effort (especially with creative freedom) to make this a special video that go beyond simply sticking together photo/videos with music. Please share examples of past work that show capability for creating such a video and ideas for how you'd approach project/video (especially with so much photo/video content). And why you'd be strong fit to take on this project.

Deliverables needed:
- highlight video. No strict deadline.

All photos and videos are here. Lot of photos/videos to work with especially short video clips I took throughout trip:
https://photos.app.goo.gl/rLYSYZZYd2XQqy1t8

Summary of different activities for context:
- plane to Tokyo
- breakfast at hotel
- robot cafe
- Tokyo day tour
- world's busiest crosswalk
- temples
- street food
- park
- shrine visit
- ramen
- GoKarting
- Sumo wresting
- dining experience
- crepres
- fine dining experience at Ninja restaurant
- bullet train
- sushi bar
- dessert restaurant
- Kyoto shrine & temple visits
- bamboo forest
- Japanes BBQ
- Zen Buddism meditation class
- Street food market
- CBD cafe
- cocktails at bar
- matcha tea ceremony
- unlimited arcade  (games, bubble soccer, baseball, etc)
- night market
- Okonomiyaki restaurant
- visit to onsen resort (hot spring)
- boating
- cooking together
- playing games
- patriots game with dad
- cleaning & re-organizing pantry & fridge


Budget: $40
Posted On: June 20, 2024 08:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Animated Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video creator to assist us in producing an animated up to 90 seconds video. The aim of this project is to bring our existing design characters to life through animation. The selected candidate will work closely with our team to conceptualise and develop the narrative, as well as create captivating visuals and motion graphics. Required skills include:
- Video editing
- Animation
- Motion graphics
- Storyboarding
- Illustration

The ideal candidate should be detail-oriented, creative, and have a strong sense of visual storytelling. This project is considered small-sized, with an estimated duration of up to 2 weeks.

We will provide a voiceover, characters to animate (if the creator doesn't have it) and brand guidelines.

Characters to use: https://www.freepik.com/search?author=26713452&authorSlug=vectorjuice&color=blue&format=author&last_filter=color&last_value=blue

The video should have subtitles so the video script is provided as well.

Here are the examples of our current videos so we are looking for something in a similar style:
https://youtu.be/YNspbI_GGGY?si=npPD1s7iO-P2Bc0e
https://youtu.be/_GqDBlTxIGs?si=bsj9KjUrEDYErY-3
https://youtu.be/pnknqIG0liA?si=Jjv-UUpWT-e9lzoy

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 20, 2024 07:58 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: Slovakia
click to apply

item.title: 🎥 Professional Videographer Needed for Online Dressmaking Course Shooting in West Yorkshire. - Upwork
item.description:
🎥 Professional Videographer Needed for Online Dressmaking Course Shooting in West Yorkshire.

I am in search of a skilled videographer to capture high-quality footage for an online dressmaking course. The course will be filmed in a studio in West Yorkshire over an undetermined number of days, potentially taking around 2-3 weeks with full days of up to 10 hours. [Editing is not required]

✨ Requirements:
Proven experience in videography with a focus on educational content.
Must have professional-grade equipment, including 2-3 4K (at least) cameras, high-quality lighting kit, tripod, etc.
Availability during the specified project dates (including weekends).
Strong attention to detail and ability to capture the intricacies of sewing processes.
Flexibility!

If you meet these requirements, please message me your portfolio and availability. Thank you

Hourly Range: $25.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 07:57 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production
Skills: Videography, Video Production
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: US-Based Video Content Creator Needed - Upwork
item.description:
US-Based Video Content Creator Needed

We are looking for someone reliable who can shoot and edit 10 to 20-minute videos for publishing on our YouTube channel and website.
Topic of videos is home improvement (more details upon application).
Your main task would be to use and review niche-related products which you would receive for free. Many of them you are allowed to keep if you want.
We provide the facts and figures on every product, but want you to share your own personal and unbiased experience.
You MUST be based in mainland US.
You MUST be okay with appearing in front of the camera.

item.description:
HI!
I am looking for a UCG (user-generated content) creator, who can create a short promo video in English describing an online trading platform.
The video must be portrait-oriented.

Please make sure you have good-quality headphones and a phone that can take good-quality video.

I will provide you with a script, you will need to send me the footage shot on your smartphone. The editing and post-production will be done by the team on our side.
